titleStmt.title: To the Parliament of the common-wealth of England who are in place of authority to do justice, and in present power to ease the oppressed nation from its bonds : councel and advice unto you / from a friend that seeks after truth and righteousness from you ...
titleStmt.author: Burrough, Edward, 1634-1662.

titleStmt.title: To the Parliament of the common-wealth of England who are in place of authority to do justice, and in present power to ease the oppressed nation from its bonds : councel and advice unto you / from a friend that seeks after truth and righteousness from you ...
titleStmt.author: Burrough, Edward, 1634-1662.

notesStmt.note: Signed and dated at end: Lon. 6 of 8 mon., 1659. Edward Burrough.
